findings.title: Inexistent Zero Address Check
findings.description: The setVault function of VaultOwned does not properly sanitize the input vault_ argument.

findings.title: Cross-Chain Replay Attack
findings.description: The DOMAIN_SEPARATOR of the Sapphire Token (SAP) contract is calculated once during the contract's constructor which is not compliant with the EIP-712 recommended implementation of domainSeparator.
